definitions.definition: Having a thick edge or point ; not sharp .
Dull in understanding ; slow of discernment ; opposed to acute .
Abrupt in address ; plain ; unceremonious ; wanting in the forms of civility ; rough in manners or speech .
examples: I was taken aback by the blunt admission that he had never liked my company.

definitions.definition: Slow or deficient in feeling : insensitive .

main_definition: Having a thick edge or point ; not sharp .
secondary_definitions: Dull in understanding ; slow of discernment ; opposed to acute .
Abrupt in address ; plain ; unceremonious ; wanting in the forms of civility ; rough in manners or speech .
Slow or deficient in feeling : insensitive .
